law.catch_line: Legislative intent regarding child support statutes.
law.text: It is the intent of the General Assembly that requirements relating to child support or paternity established by KRS Chapters 205, 403, 405, 406, and 407 shall be in compliance with the provisions of 42 U.S.C. secs. 651 et seq.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 38, effective July 15, 1998.
